title: Singer-songwriter Syd's Brief But Spectacular Take on her path to being an artist
description: Singer-songwriter Syd is one of the pioneering and most prominent voices to sing about same-sex relationships in R&B music. She has now released solo music after working with hip-hop collective Odd Future, and her own Grammy-nominated band The Internet. Syd offers her Brief But Spectacular Take on her path to being an artist. PBS NewsHour is supported by - https://www.pbs.org/newshour/about/funders
